description: A flat piece of plastic that finishes the construction of a magazine.  This one is for the magazines of the Glock brand.  Can be attached to a Glock magazine body to make it a usable magazine.

variants.description: A flat piece of plastic that prevents the magazine spring from falling out.  This one is an original base plate from Glock, and comes standard with the magazines of the brand.  Can be attached to Glock magazine bodies to finalize it into a usable magazine.  <variant:black>

notes: trim is to account for both the curved edges and the interior space
the latter becomes apparent from images in the height source

description: A small, cube-ish plastic cup that finishes the construction of a magazine.  This one is for the magazines of the Glock brand.  Can be attached to a Glock magazine body to make an extended magazine.

variants.description: Glock's own extension plate for their magazines.  Extends the length of the magazine and adds 2 extra rounds to its capacity.  <variant:black>

notes: trim is to account for both the curved edges and the interior space
